Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Dermaseptin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Acholeplasma laidlawii A-PG8 (MIC=12.5 µM), Spiroplasma melliferum BC3 (MIC=50 µM), Rhizobium meliloti 102F34 (MIC=12.5 µM), Escherichia coli K12 (MIC=10 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium KM (MIC=3.12 µM), Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 27853 (MIC=1.56 µM), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 27853 (MIC=3.0 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptide against the Gram-positive bacteria and the Gram-negative-bacteria.

Literature.Title: Phylloxin, a novel peptide antibiotic of the dermaseptin family of antimicrobial/opioid peptide precursors.
Literature.Author: Pierre TN, Seon AA, Amiche M, Nicolas P.
